title: What Season Is It?
subtle: Informational (nonfiction), 50 words, Level C (Grade K), Lexile 110L
description: Each season brings new weather and fun activities for students to enjoy. In What Season Is It? students will learn how each season is different. Detailed photographs and high-frequency words support emergent readers. This book can also be used to teach students how to connect to prior knowledge as well as to identify the main idea and details in order to better understand the text.
meta: change, fall, grow, spring, summer, winter
Connect to prior knowledge to understand text
Main Idea and Details : Identify the main idea and details from a text
Quotation Marks : Understand and use quotation marks
High-Frequency Words : Identify and use high-frequency words does, in, when

Promote higher-order thinking for small groups
or whole class
